original_title: Court issues injunction order over SJB’s National List
original_body_lines: The Colombo District Court today issued a restraining order preventing the Samagi Jana Balawegaya (SJB) from submitting their National List without including the name of Nizam Kariapper of the Sri Lanka Muslim Congress (SLMC).
The District Court issued this order after considering a plaint filed by SLMC leader MP Rauff Hakeem.
